messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] NHK dramas
messages.msgSnippet: That is really wonderful news. Thanks for the info. I will certainly look forward to this one. ... From: Mark Hall  To:
messages.messageBody:
That is really wonderful news. Thanks for the info. I will certainly look
forward to this one.
----- Original Message -----
From: Mark Hall <markhall@...>
To: <samuraihistory@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2001 8:18 PM
Subject: [samuraihistory] NHK dramas


> It was also announced tonight on the NHK news that
> NHK will begin production a drama based on the life of Prince Shotoku for
> broadcast in 2002-3 on their
> HI-VISION (digital satellite) channel.
>
> Later, Mark Hall
>
>
>
>
> To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
> samuraihistory-unsubscribe@egroups.com
>
>
>

messages.subject: NHK dramas
messages.msgSnippet: It was also announced tonight on the NHK news that NHK will begin production a drama based on the life of Prince Shotoku for broadcast in 2002-3 on their
messages.messageBody:
It was also announced tonight on the NHK news that
NHK will begin production a drama based on the life of Prince Shotoku for
broadcast in 2002-3 on their
HI-VISION (digital satellite) channel.

Later, Mark Hall
